channel.title: Hiding my IP Address?
channel.description:
Is it possible to hide my IP Address from a company as big as Jagex? I know they've got to have the best software for detecting things like this.
Please help. I'd hate for my good account to get banned =P

item.title: Hiding my IP Address?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I believe if you use the unsigned applet, when they try to read your IP it comes up as 127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0 as a security precaution. But it’s best to use unsigned whenever you can anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding my IP Address?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Or you just go unsigned… especially if we’re talking about internet cafes.

I use tor, if I ever need to proxy.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding my IP Address?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:14, topic:54597”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=77125.msg858516#msg858516 date=1170518853]

Watch out, assuming you are using windows in your C:\windows.file_store_32\ folder there is a file called UID.dat, you must delete this file everytime you go to switch characters or they will nail you.

However, if you use the unsigned client it cannot write to your hard drive and you will be safe from that type of detection.

Check out TOR for an awesome socks5 proxy.

How practical would it be to delete uid.dat every time it’s made? I mean it could be suspicious to Jagex but then you could say some virus scanner keeps saying it’s a virus.
[/quote]
I doubt they’re going to notice it… They have alot of players.[/quote]

I know but it wouldn’t take a lot of effort to make an automated machine to tell if an acc has a certain number of uid changes then flag them.

Read full topic

[/quote]

How practical would it be to delete uid.dat every time it’s made? I mean it could be suspicious to Jagex but then you could say some virus scanner keeps saying it’s a virus.[/quote]
